text: Girish Mahajan is a politician from Jalgaon district of Maharashtra. He is current MLA of Jamner. He was minister of water resources, Medical education and minister for irrigation of Maharashtra state in Fadnavis's cabinet . Girish Mahajan is a member of the 14th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly for the Jamner Constituency, serving his sixth term ==Early life== Mahajan was born in Jamner into a Marathi Gurjar] OBC]Article in Hindustan Times family. ==Career== As a college student, Mahajan was an active member of ABVP in 1978. In the ABVP, he started as a grassroots worker where he painted walls and distributed promotional posters for politicians. He was appointed as Taluka President of ABVP. Mahajan' political career commenced in earnest in the early eighties, when he became Taluka President of the Bharatiya Janata Yuva Morcha (youth wing of the BJP) in Maharashtra. In 1992, Mahajan was elected as a Gram-Panchayat Election for Jamner. In 1995 he was elected to the Maharashtra state assembly for the first time. He served his 5th term as MLA as of 2014. Mahajan was sworn in as the Water Resources Minister of Maharashtra on 31 October 2014. His government won a confidence motion by oral vote on 12 November 2014 allowing it to continue to govern. ==Positions held== ===Within BJP=== *President, BJYM Jamner Taluka (1988-1990). *Vice President, BJP Maharashtra (1993-1995). *District Chairman, BJP, Jalgaon (2006). *Party Pratod. BJP Legislature Party, Maharashtra State (2008). *Region Vice President, BJP, Maharashtra Pradesh (2011). ===Legislative=== *Member, Maharashtra Legislative Assembly - consecutive 5 Terms since 1995 *Cabinet Minister : Irrigation Minister, Maharashtra State. *Guardian Minister : Guardian Minister (Nashik and Nandurbar) *Kumbhamela Minister : Kumbhamela Minister (Nashik) *Sarpanch, Jamner Gram Panchayat (1992-1995) ==See also== * Girish Mahjan Website * Jamner * Jamner Railway Station * Jamner Vidhansabha Constituency ==References== https://cmo.maharashtra.gov.in/en/governor-and- cabinet-ministers 6.https://cmo.maharashtra.gov.in/en/governor-and-cabinet- ministers Category:Maharashtra MLAs 1999–2004 Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2004–2009 Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2009–2014 Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2019– Category:People from Jalgaon district Category:Marathi politicians Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Maharashtra MLAs 1995–1999 Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra
title: Girish Dattatray Mahajan
